def prime(x):
    if x == 1: 
        return False
    if x == 2 or x == 3: 
        return True
    if x % 2 == 0: 
        return False
    for i in range(3, int(x ** 0.5)):
        if x % i == 0:
            return False 
    return True
        
def palindrome(n):
    return n==n[::-1]
    
N=int(input())
while True:
    if palindrome(str(N)):
        if prime(N):
            print(N)
            break
    N+=1
